TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeComp

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 `ITypeComp` 인터페이스 MSDN Library를 참조 하십시오.For more information about the `ITypeComp` interface, see the MSDN Library. 네이티브 코드에서 COM 메서드가 HRESULT를 반환 하는 경우 공용 언어 런타임 예외를 throw 합니다.The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 지도 Hresult 및 예외](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)합니다.For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void Bind (string szName, int lHashVal, short wFlags, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo ppTInfo, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DESCKIND pDescKind, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.BINDPTR pBindPtr);

span.span: Maps a name to a member of a type, or binds global variables and functions contained in a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 자세한 내용은 기존 설명서를 참조 `ITypeComp::Bind` MSDN 라이브러리에서.For more information, see the existing documentation for `ITypeComp::Bind` in the MSDN library.
